name.description: Name of the option or feature.

type.description: Primary type of the option/feature. Add this to the content pack's _meta.filters.optionFeatureType array if it is not a standard type.

class.description: Secondary type of the option/feature. Add this to the content pack's _meta.filters.optionFeatureClass array if it is not a standard class.

labels.description: Extra labels. These are placed above the description and persist across the description and info tabs.

name.description: Label name. This will be bolded

info.description: Extra information. This is displayed in a secondary tab.

summary.description: Deprecated. This used to be a short blurb that appeared in the popover.

items.description: Deprecated. Do not add values here.

meta.description: Metadata for the option/feature. You likely won't need this.

id.description: Unique item id. You shouldn't have to touch this field.
